boltslinger.name: Boltslinger
boltslinger.description: Boltslingers deal massive amounts of hits and excel at close range. (Speed, Damage Burst)

sniper.name: Sharpshooter
sniper.description: Sharpshooters excel at aiming and can deal brutal hits. (Range, Power Shots)

trapper.name: Trapper
trapper.description: Trappers can trap enemies and use beasts. (Delayed Damage, CC)
trapper.shortDescription: Mass damage with traps and beasts

arrowbomb.name: Arrow Bomb
description: Click Combo: LEFT-RIGHT-RIGHT
Shoots a long-ranged arrow that explodes
and deals high damage over a large area.
(Self-damage for 10% of your DPS)
 Mana Cost: 45
 Total Damage: 160% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 140%)
( Fire: 20%)
 Range: ±26 Blocks
 Area of Effect: 4.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

bowProficiency.name: Bow Proficiency
description: Improve your Main Attack's damage
and range when using a bow.
 Main Attack Damage: +5%
 Main Attack Range: +6 Blocks

arrowBombCost1.name: Cheaper Arrow Bomb
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Bomb.
 Mana Cost: -10
Required Ability: Arrow Bomb

directHit.name: Heart Shatter
description: Hitting a mob directly with Arrow Bomb,
will shatter its heart and deal additional damage.
 Total Damage: +100% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +100%)

hastyShots.name: Double Shots
description: Doubles Main Attack arrows
(Harder to hit distant enemies)
 Main Attack Damage: -40% (per arrow)

escape.name: Escape
description: Click Combo: LEFT-LEFT-LEFT
Throw yourself backward to avoid danger.
(Hold shift while escaping to cancel)
 Mana Cost: 20

powerShots.name: Power Shots
description: Your Main Attack arrows have

arrowstorm.name: Arrow Storm
description: Click Combo: LEFT-RIGHT-LEFT
Shoots a stream of 8 arrows,
dealing significant damage to close
mobs and pushing them away.
 Mana Cost: 35
 Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS, per arrow)
( Damage: 30%)
( Thunder: 10%)
 Range: ±16 Blocks

escapeCost1.name: Cheaper Escape
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Escape.
 Mana Cost: -5

arrowshield.name: Arrow Shield
description: Click Combo: LEFT-LEFT-RIGHT
Forms a shield around you that slightly reduces
the damage you take. Being hit will consume one
charge of the shield. Enemies that get too close
will take damage and be knocked away. (3 charges)
 Mana Cost: 30
 Total Damage: 70% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 60%)
( Air: 10%)
 Effect: 20% Resistance Bonus (❁)
 Area of Effect: 2.3 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
 Duration: 60s

windyfeet.name: Windy Feet
description: Casting Escape grants a speed buff
to you and nearby players.
 Effect: +20% Walk Speed to Allies
 Duration: 120s
 Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

archerAirPath.name: Air Mastery
description:  Air Damage: +3-4
 Air Damage: +15%

archerThunderPath.name: Thunder Mastery
description:  Thunder Damage: +1-8
 Thunder Damage: +10%

archerFirePath.name: Fire Mastery
description:  Fire Damage: +3-5
 Fire Damage: +15%

archerWaterPath.name: Water Mastery
description:  Water Damage: +2-4
 Water Damage: +15%

archerEarthPath.name: Earth Mastery
description:  Earth Damage: +2-4
 Earth Damage: +20%

nimbleString.name: Nimble String
description: Doubles the speed of Arrow Storm and
shoots +6 arrows per stream.
 Total Damage: -10% (of your DPS, per arrow)
( Damage: -5%)
( Thunder: -5%)
Required Ability: Arrow Storm

arrowrain.name: Arrow Rain
description: When Arrow Shield loses its last charge, spew
150 arrows around you to rain down on enemies.
 Total Damage: 250% (of your DPS, per arrow)
( Damage: 150%)
( Air: 100%)
Required Ability: Arrow Shield

mossyArrowStorm.name: Bryophyte Roots
description: Hitting an enemy with Arrow Storm will
create an area of effect that slows them
down and deals damage every 0.4s.
 Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 30%)
( Earth: 10%)
 Effect: 40% Slowness () to Enemies
 Duration: 5s
 Area of Effect: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Required Ability: Arrow Storm
Min Trapper Archetype: 1

fireCreep.name: Fire Creep
description: Arrow Bomb will leave a trail of
fire for 6s. Enemies that walk
into it take damage every 0.4s.
 Total Damage: 50% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 30%)
( Fire: 20%)
 Duration: 6s
 Cooldown: 3s

phantomDarts.name: Phantom Ray
description: Condense Arrow Storm into a single ray
that damages enemies 10 times per second.
 Mana Cost: -5
 Total Damage: 30% (of your DPS, per hit)
( Damage: 25%)
( Water: 5%)
 Range: 16 Blocks
 Duration: 1.2s
Required Ability: Arrow Storm

tripleShots.name: Triple Shots
description: Triples Main Attack arrows but they deal
-10% of normal Main Attack arrow damage.
 Main Attack Damage: -10%
Required Ability: Double Shots

hitToRename.name: Frenzy
description: Hitting an enemy will give you a brief buff
of +3% Walk Speed. (Max +70%) -10% of
the bonus decays every second.

guardianAngels.name: Guardian Angels
description: Your Arrow Shield arrows turn into sentient bows
that attack nearby enemies up to 8 times each.
Arrow Shield loses -1 charge.
(Arrow Shield will no longer knock
enemies away or provide resistance)
 Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS, per arrow)
( Damage: 30%)
( Air: 10%)
 Range: 6 Blocks
 Duration: 60s
Required Ability: Arrow Shield
Min Boltslinger Archetype: 3

explodingTrap.name: Basaltic Trap
description: When you hit the ground with Arrow Bomb, leave
a Trap that damages enemies. (Max 2 Traps)
 Total Damage: 250% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 210%)
( Earth: 20%)
( Fire: 20%)
 Range: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
 Area of Effect: 7 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Min Trapper Archetype: 2

focus.name: Focus
description: When hitting an aggressive enemy 5+
blocks away, gain +1 Focus ➽. (Max 3)
(Focus resets if you miss once)
 Damage Bonus: +15% (per focus)
 Cooldown: 1.1s
Min Sharpshooter Archetype: 2

windstorm.name: Windstorm
description: Arrow Storm will shoot +1 stream
of arrows and +2 extra arrows per stream.
Arrow Storm gains recoil.
 Total Damage: -10% (of your DPS, per arrow)
( Damage: -9%)
( Thunder: -3%)
( Air: +2%)
Required Ability: Arrow Storm

arrowStormCost1.name: Cheaper Arrow Storm
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Storm.
 Mana Cost: -5
Required Ability: Arrow Storm

implosion.name: Implosion
description: Arrow Bomb pulls enemies
towards you. If a Trap is nearby,
it will pull them towards it instead.
Increases Heart Shatter's damage.
 Total Damage: +40% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +40%)

tripleshield.name: More Shields
description: Gives Arrow Shield +2 extra charges.
Reduces Guardian Angels' damage.
 Total Damage: -18% (of your DPS, for Guardian Angels, per arrow)
( Damage: -13%)
( Air: -5%)
Required Ability: Arrow Shield

timeBomb.name: Patient Hunter
description: Your Traps will deal +20% more damage
for every second it's active. (Max +100%)
Increase your maximum Traps by +1.
Required Ability: Basaltic Trap

grapplingHook.name: Grappling Hook
description: When casting Escape, throw a hook
that pulls you when hitting a block. If you
hit an enemy, pull them towards you instead.
(Escape will not throw you backward anymore)
 Range: 30 Blocks

moreFocus.name: More Focus
description: Increase your maximum Focus ➽ by +2.

betterWindyFeet.name: Stormy Feet
description: Windy Feet will last longer and grant a stronger
 Effect: +20% Walk Speed to Allies
 Duration: +60s
Required Ability: Windy Feet

wolfSummon.name: Call of the Hound
description: Arrow Shield summons a Hound that will
attack aggressive enemies every 0.25s
and drag them towards your traps.
 Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 40%)
 Vision: 18 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
 Duration: 60s
Required Ability: Arrow Shield

leap.name: Leap
description: Leap forwards when you double jump.
 Cooldown: 2s
Min Boltslinger Archetype: 4

traveler.name: Traveler
description: For every 1% Walk Speed
you have from items, gain
+1 Raw Spell Damage (Max 100)

bouncing.name: Bouncing Bomb
description: Arrow Bomb will bounce once
when hitting a block or enemy.

ivyrootMamba.name: Ivyroot Mamba
description: Bryophyte Roots summons a Snake after
disappearing that will spit weakening
Enemies will be weakened for 1.5s.
 Total Damage: 100% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 80%)
( Earth: 20%)
 Effects: -15% Damage Bonus () to Enemies
 Vision: 12 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
 Duration: 18s
Required Ability: Bryophyte Roots
Min Trapper Archetype: 3

concentration.name: Twain's Arc
description: If you have 2+ Focus ➽, holding shift will
summon the Twain's Arc. Charge it up to
shoot a destructive long-range beam.
(Damage is dealt as Main Attack Damage)
 Total Damage: 220%
( Damage: 220%)
 Range: 64 Blocks
Min Sharpshooter Archetype: 4

rocketJump.name: Rocket Jump
description: Arrow Bomb's recoil is increased, and
its self-damage is reduced to 5%.
Required Ability: Arrow Bomb

scorchedEarth.name: Scorched Earth
description: Fire Creep becomes much stronger.
 Total Damage: +15% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +10%)
( Fire: +5%)
 Duration: +2s
Required Ability: Fire Creep

moreTraps1.name: More Traps
description: Increase your maximum Traps by +3.
Required Ability: Basaltic Trap

arrowBombDamage1.name: Refined Gunpowder
description: Increase the damage of Arrow Bomb.
 Total Damage: +50% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +50%)

fiercystomp.name: Fierce Stomp
description: When using Escape, hold shift to
quickly drop down and deal damage.
 Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 120%)
 Area of Effect: 4 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

arrowShieldCost1.name: Cheaper Arrow Shield
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Shield.
 Mana Cost: -5
Required Ability: Arrow Shield

betterArrowShield.name: Better Arrow Shield
description: Arrow Shield's radius, knockback,
Guardian Angels' damage is increased.
 Total Damage: +40% (of your DPS, for Arrow Shield)
( Damage: +40%)
 Area of Effect: +1 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
 Total Damage: +3% (of your DPS, for Guardian Angels, per arrow)
( Damage: +3%)
Required Ability: Arrow Shield

shockingBomb.name: Shocking Bomb
description: Arrow Bomb will be unaffected by
gravity and increase its explosion damage.
 Total Damage: +40% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +20%)
( Thunder: +20%)
Min Sharpshooter Archetype: 4
Required Ability: Arrow Bomb

betterLeap.name: Better Leap
description: Reduce Leap's cooldown by -1s.

homingarrows.name: Homing Shots
description: Your Main Attack arrows will follow nearby
enemies and will be unaffected by gravity.
Min Sharpshooter Archetype: 2

manaTrap.name: Mana Trap
description: Your Traps will give you 0.5 Mana
per second and 10 Mana
Increase your maximum Traps by +1.
 Mana Cost: +10
 Range: 16 Blocks
Min Trapper Archetype: 6
Required Ability: Basaltic Trap

arrowStormCost2.name: Cheaper Arrow Storm
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Storm.
 Mana Cost: -5
Required Ability: Arrow Storm

initiator.name: Initiator
description: If you do not damage an enemy for
4s or more, your next successful hit
will deal +60% damage and add +1 Focus ➽.

betterGuardianAngels.name: Better Guardian Angels
description: Your Guardian Angels gain increased range and
can shoot +4 extra arrows before disappearing.
 Range: +2 Blocks
Required Ability: Guardian Angels

escapeArtist.name: Escape Artist
description: When casting Escape, release
100 arrows towards the ground.
 Total Damage: 150% (of your DPS, per arrow)
( Damage: 100%)
( Thunder: 50%)

murderFlock.name: Murder Flock
description: Basaltic Trap summons a Crow upon detonation that
will peck at aggressive enemies every 0.9s. (Max 2)
Damaged enemies will be distracted for 0.2s.
 Total Damage: 60% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 60%)
 Effect: Blindness () to Enemies
 Vision: 18 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
 Duration: 12s
Required Ability: Basaltic Trap
Min Trapper Archetype: 5

decimator.name: Decimator
description: Phantom Ray will increase its damage by 10%
everytime you do not miss with it. (Max 70%)
Required Ability: Phantom Ray

phasingBeam.name: Phasing Beam
description: Twain's Arc charges 20% faster, and
can now pierce through up to 5 enemies,
dealing reduced damage after piercing.
(Damage is dealt as Main Attack Damage)
 Total Damage: -110% (after piercing)
( Damage: -110%)
Required Ability: Twain's Arc

recycling.name: Recycling
description: When any of your projectiles miss, gain +0.08 Mana.

shrapnelBomb.name: Shrapnel Bomb
description: Arrow Bomb's explosion will fling 25
shrapnel, dealing damage in a large area.
 Total Damage: 60% (of your DPS, per shrapnel)
( Damage: 40%)
( Fire: 20%)
Min Boltslinger Archetype: 2

escapeCost2.name: Cheaper Escape
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Escape.
 Mana Cost: -5

arrowShieldCost2.name: Cheaper Arrow Shield
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Shield.
 Mana Cost: -5
Required Ability: Arrow Shield

strongerHook.name: Stronger Hook
description: Increases your Grappling Hook's
 Range: +8 Blocks
Required Ability: Grappling Hook
Min Trapper Archetype: 2

coursingRestraints.name: Coursing Restraints
description: Shocking Bomb will temporarily shock
 Effect: -15% Resistance Bonus (✃) to Enemies
 Duration: 4s
 Cooldown: 12s
Required Ability: Shocking Bomb

helicopter.name: Arrow Hurricane
description: Arrow Storm will shoot +2 extra streams of arrows.
Arrow Storm's recoil is doubled.
 Total Damage: -5% (of your DPS, per arrow)
( Damage: -3%)
( Thunder: -1%)
( Air: -1%)
Min Boltslinger Archetype: 10

triangulation.name: Tangled Traps
description: Your Traps will be connected by a rope
that deals damage to enemies every 0.2s.
Increase your maximum Traps by +1.
 Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 20%)
( Air: 20%)
Required Ability: Basaltic Trap

beastLore.name: Beast Lore
description: Increase your maximum Snakes by +1.
Increase your maximum Crows by +2.
Increase the damage of your Hound.
 Total Damage: +40% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +40%)
Required Ability: Call of the Hound
Min Trapper Archetype: 7

theAscendedOne.name: Crepuscular Ray
description: If you have 5+ Focus ➽, casting
Arrow Storm while 4+ blocks above
the ground will cause you to levitate
and shoot 20 homing arrows per second
until you run out of Focus ➽.
While in this state, you will
lose 1 Focus ➽ per second.
 Total Damage: 50% (of your DPS, per arrow)
( Damage: 35%)
( Water: 15%)
Required Ability: Arrow Storm
Min Sharpshooter Archetype: 10

iceTrap.name: Chilling Snare
description: Attach an icy snare to Basaltic Trap,
drastically inhibiting and damaging nearby
enemies every 0.2s after it detonates.
Increase your maximum Traps by +1.
 Total Damage: 50% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 40%)
( Water: 10%)
 Effects: 10% Slowness () to Enemies, per hit (Max 90%)
 Duration: 5s
 Area of Effect: 7 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
 Cooldown: 12s
Min Trapper Archetype: 11
Required Ability: Basaltic Trap

allSeeingPanoptes.name: All-Seeing Panoptes
description: Your bows from Guardian Angels become
all-seeing, increasing their range, damage and
letting them shoot up to +4 times each.
 Total Damage: +7% (of your DPS, per arrow)
( Damage: +5%)
( Fire: +2%)
 Range: +4 Blocks
Required Ability: Guardian Angels

timeBombMaxDamage.name: Stronger Patient Hunter
description: Patient Hunter will increase its damage by +10%
per second, and increase its Max Damage by +100%.
Increase your maximum Traps by +1.
Required Ability: Patient Hunter

snowStorm.name: Snow Storm
description: Enemies near you will be slowed down.
 Effect: 30% Slowness () to Enemies
 Range: 3 Blocks

moreFocus2.name: More Focus
description: Increase your maximum Focus ➽ by +2.

dontGetHit.name: Elusive
description: If you do not get hit for 4+ seconds, become
immune to self-damage and Arrow Storm
(Agility dodging counts as not getting hit)

geyserstomp.name: Geyser Stomp
description: Fierce Stomp will create geysers, dealing
more damage and pushing enemies away vertically.
 Total Damage: +80% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +50%)
( Water: +30%)
 Area of Effect: +1 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Required Ability: Fierce Stomp

grapeBomb.name: Grape Bomb
description: Arrow Bomb will throw 2 additional
 Total Damage: 80% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 60%)
( Fire: 20%)
 Area of Effect: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

arrowBombCost2.name: Cheaper Arrow Bomb
description: Reduce the Mana cost of Arrow Bomb.
